content.body: For what it’s worth, I did figure out a grammar that I think unambiguously loosens the operator to be looser than `….…` and `new …(…)` but tighter than `…[…]`, `…(…)`, `…?.…`, and `new …`. (`new a::b()` would be a SyntaxError.)
